post.body: peek a boo I see you! LOL
b safe. Praying for ya.
hey, this is Paul Turner, and I'm at the Sheraton. If you are interested in random chatter about YM, coffee is on me.
vallaros has good BBQ.
I believe he says done as in with my workout.
loved Madagascar 2. Loved the old lady.
hey buddy, thanks for the plug. Could you back and leave a review?
Listening to sports radio and the debacle that is Auburn football. I don't care, I'm a Notre Dame fan.
Taking lunch and break from installing doorknobs, painting, and oh so much more LOL.
Watching my son's MS basketball team get crushed. Ow!
40 years old and registering for college classes. I have lost my mind.
Off to job number 2. Ties! Ties! They're everywhere! Is that mannequin looking at me?
Just had lunch with good friends from camp. Now to face the black horde of black Friday at work.
Happy Thanksgiving from the Turner family.
working on book reviews for YWJ before I go off to work.
Well, after a great 5 days in Nashville talking with youth workers it's back to painting houses and selling ties. God is still good.
Great time In Nashville. Love loving on youth workers. Can't wait to see the fruit of our labor.
Sitting at a little bistro called The Union about to eat breakfast. I am appreciating the much needed alone time.
Working with my friend Rick @ the Unkommon Media booth @ YS. Come by and see us.
Heading to Nashville for NYWC and to help my friend Rick with Unkommom Media booth. Hope to see many of you there.
Been listening to the new Matt Papa worship cd. It's encouraging and convicting.
It is 1:07am and I am still at work. No, I am not kidding.
Helping my Komrads at Unkommonmedia.com.
